case.name: Petra's Speech
case.description: Petra has an unusual method of speaking, and will often take idioms and figures of speech by their literal meanings throughout the game. She draws attention to this in a different situation, 'Petra's Speech Explained'.

case.name: Petra's Arm Tattoo
case.description: Petra draws attention to her arm tattoo (hidden in her default outfit until now, but visible before in others). Tattoos like hers have special meaning to the people of Brigid - protection, health, good fortune, and so on.

case.name: Petra's Birthday
case.description: September 7th is Petra's birthday! She also makes comments if her birthday is tomorrow on Sep 6th.

case.name: Petra's Speech Explained
case.description: Petra draws attention to her weird method of speaking if she is playing with someone who isnt from fire emblem: three houses.

case.name: Ignatz's Glasses
case.description: Ignatz and Petra have a cute interaction where she briefly holds, and wears, Ignatz's glasses. This is the start of the interaction chain. (The case this situation points to is unused but covers both variants when you create a response to it)

case.name: Brigid Booty
case.description: After stripping to stage 4, Petra will point to, and explain, the tattoo on her back at least once, giving a view of her derri√®re.

notes.note: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5EbnoElOJx0 please dont actually respond to this really dumb joke
She has mentioned her homeland of Brigid in Stripping 0
you made this priority 200 deliberately; make any lines that are "more important" than this play at 201 or more
If Petra has flirted with Leonie 3 or more times and they are next to each other, start the dual forfeit here
If Yuna is present, this overrides the 'gate' that they need to have flirted already.
If Yuna is present, this overrides the 'gate' that they need to have flirted twice already.
If Yuna is present, this overrides the 'gate' that they need to have flirted already.
This version takes priority over the basic case in order to jump-start the flirting sequence. It can happen two stages sooner than the normal case.
If Yuna is present, this version of the flirting line for this stage can play
If Yuna is present, this version of the flirting line for this stage can play

The idea of this line is that if Petra and Leonie have already flirted enough to trigger a dual FF, then Petra will start throwing the game. This is also backed up by setting her AI to throw in every Hand round.
This should unlock the collectable and reset the flirt counter back to 0 if Leonie finished in the dual forfeit
This should unlock the collectable and reset the flirt counter back to 0 if Petra finished in the dual forfeit
asking kumatora about her PSI, Petra thinks it is general magic
petra is suprised that kumatora is asking like such a tomboy, rather than how a noble would be expected to
+1 to the flirt counter to reward playing with yuna
Generally assumes Sucrose has been saying scientific terminology all game
You can go from here by having charlie say "every culture has its own version of hell!" or reaffirm "yeah there's only one version of hell", up to you
petra
"Well, there's nowhere better to watch people than here. You should know, though, if you wanted to see me naked, you could have just asked."
"O-Oh. Claude? He and I are... I mean, we're close. He's my best friend. And we've... you know, messed around a bit, but we're not lovers, really... Why? Do people think we are?"
Thanking Yuna and co. for setting up their dual forfeit
petra is *trying* to use a play on words here, but, it might end up making meia think she meant hunting literally, which could be a funny misunderstanding

Counts how many times Petra and Leonie have had specific, 'flirty' exchanges with one another. If this reaches 4 or more, it enables dual forfeits. Resets when a dual forfeit completes itself.
Counts up to 4. If it's at 4, she can call someone a `poggers champion'. I'm serious.
Polly's vanishing trick, part A.
Polly's vanishing trick, part B.
Petra says pogchamp. I'm sorry, but also not sorry.
If she's alive for a few rounds with only her bra left, she will tease her opponents slightly by pulling on a strap.

Cock and ball torture (CBT) is a sexual activity involving application of pain or constriction to the male genitals. This may involve directly painful activities, such as genital piercing, wax play, genital spanking, squeezing, ball-busting, genital flogging, urethral play, tickle torture, erotic electrostimulation or even kicking. The recipient of such activities may receive direct physical pleasure via masochism, or knowledge that the play is pleasing to a sadistic dominant.
Giving a response to Wikipe-tan asking for donations. Encourages the human to donate.

pendingLines.line: Next I will be studying, training, researching, sparring... I am having a lot to do!
